website_summaries.verdict: Despite occasional concerns, it's a must-have for men who love Michael Kors but want a watch with timeless appeal and a classic-looking leather strap.
pros: This watch is a timepiece with looks that will never go out of style, thanks to the brown leather strap and blue chronograph dial
Has three subdials and date window
cons: Rare complaints of it losing time or stopping altogether

customer_reviews.title: Dont be so skeptic
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for myself after going to the MK retail store and buying one for my brother. Slick, stylish watch was cheaper buying from amazon. Couldn't see any difference compared to one bought in store. Except the box coloure. Functions well. Love the design, and coloure. Definitely a good purchase for a man.
customer_reviews.author: Clay R.

customer_reviews.title: The dial is the larger more stylish size that is popular nowadays which I questioned if he'd like or not
customer_reviews.text: It was a Christmas gift for my boyfriend. I bought it without knowledge of whether he'd appreciate it or not. He loves it. The dial is the larger more stylish size that is popular nowadays which I questioned if he'd like or not. The leather is sturdy. The watch is really beautiful and looks tremendous on his wrist. It's easy to read. He's not worn his other watches since receiving this one a couple of weeks ago. I highly recommend this purchase for a good looking men's watch.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: GREAT watch!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husband for our anniversary. He loves it! Everyone compliments him on it. If you have a smaller wrist, beware. The case is huge! But it's flattering and keeps good time.
customer_reviews.author: LWlovesmyMan

customer_reviews.title: He loves it
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my boyfriend a little while ago, and he loves it! its great quality rather than being some type of knock off. Leather strap is good quality, the face has a protector over it so it wouldn't be scratched during delivery
customer_reviews.author: ES

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good looking watch. It is to replace another Michael KOrs watch that had the band break and there was no place to find a replacement to fit the curved pin that held it to the watch. This one has a straight pin, and thus can be replaced if needed.
customer_reviews.author: peg

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice, but I would say pay $50 more and buy a real watch
customer_reviews.text: This watch looks nice but has some significant design flaws. The second ticker is not aligned with the tick marks, and if you observe closely you can see the discrepancy. The leather also feels a bit cheap, and has already started to wear out with a bit of usage. If you're on a really tight budget, I would say buy this watch. But I would recommend that you pay $50 more, and buy a Citizen Eco-Drive. Overall this watch looks nice though.
customer_reviews.author: Nejat Can

customer_reviews.title: Buying another one!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second one of these watches! I will probably end up purchasing a couple more. Love the design, and the simple chronograph features. The blue dial looks amazing in the sun. It is a nice casual, and paired with the right band it could be a nice formal-wear watch. Good price point as well.
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Watch
customer_reviews.text: I just loved this watch & the actual price of the watch is indeed $250.00 if you happen to visit a MK outlet in a huge mall. This is 100% true MK watch & not fake at all. It looks great with formals & semi - formals, i have had a few upper management folks asking me about the watch at work.
customer_reviews.author: KS

customer_reviews.title: Impressive
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful watch face. The strap is brown leather, will need to be replaced in the future from wearing it so much. The appearance is exactly as we had expected and so I am pleased to say it is worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny Z

customer_reviews.title: Meh!!
customer_reviews.text: It was a nice looking watch but the date wasn't accurate and it wouldn't change when I tried to reset it. It didn't come with the paperwork that other customers stated was included. Overall it looked nice but I'm not sure of the authenticity of it. I returned the watch and probably won't purchase another.
customer_reviews.author: Kellie

customer_reviews.title: Classy
customer_reviews.text: This was gift for my husband. He absolutely loved it. Its stylish and has a classy look. Its big but not ridiculously huge. The brown leather band is of good quality. We will see how it holds up because he does wear it Everyday!
customer_reviews.author: Leticia D.

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth it. Looks good and with a little care it'll last
customer_reviews.text: Had for a few months now and I'm very glad I got it. Despite all the wear and tear it has been through, the absolutely worst thing that has happened was a tiny, hard-to-notice scratch on the watch's surface. For reference, this has been worn almost daily from college classes to roller coasters at six flags. For the price and brand and durability, this was an incredible deal!
customer_reviews.author: Velxor

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING
customer_reviews.text: This watch was amazingly stunning! Gave it to my boyfriend as a present and he loves it!! He wears it everyday, and has had it for a while now and it still looks amazing. He says he always gets compliments about it, its a great everyday watch!!! Would recommend to any girlfriend who doesn't know what to give their boyfriend as a present. Or anyone in general.
customer_reviews.author: Lu

customer_reviews.title: Malfunction of the watch
customer_reviews.text: I like the watch but I have to keep adjusting the time every couple of hours sometimes goes fast and sometimes gets behind I might going to have to return it it’s a shame cause I really like the watch PS I been having a lot problems trying to get a watch the works properly from amazon this is my third watch I probably going to return because of malfunction or inaccurate merchandise AMAZON you need to have better quality control of the product you selling???
customer_reviews.author: Felipe Gomez

customer_reviews.title: Very Handsome, Well Made Watch
customer_reviews.text: Got this watch for my boyfriends birthday. He absolutely loves it, and the brown band is an excellent contrast to the lovely blue face. Would highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Samantha K

customer_reviews.title: I get complimented on this watch every time I wear it around someone for the first time.
customer_reviews.text: This is just a great looking watch for any male. A man should have at least one nice watch and this definitely checks off the box for something that can be both formal or semi casual. THe blue face looks great, the leather band is very high quality, and the size of the face is very stylish. I'm in my 20's and have very skinny wrists but this watch looks great. For the price I haven't seen anything else that looks this good currently
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: but it is dull and it already has lost its appearance
customer_reviews.text: I thought this watch would have a sparkle, but it is dull and it already has lost its appearance.

customer_reviews.title: Nice watch
customer_reviews.text: This is a stylish nice watch. I like the size and it's been great so far.

customer_reviews.title: Happy Husband!
customer_reviews.text: Gorgeous watch! I bought it for my husband for Christmas & he loves it!

customer_reviews.title: Loving it!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this watch. I'm a girl but love big watches. I was afraid that the band would not be small enough for my small wrists but it works on the last latch. At first couldn't decide on blue or black dial. Got the blue and love it!! Very classic watch!
customer_reviews.author: Wendy W

customer_reviews.title: Classy without being pretentious.
customer_reviews.text: LOVE THIS PEICE! A very dark dynamic blue face, with its rich dark brown leather strap. If you have an 11 inch wrist like me yes it will fit you. Posting picture of this.

customer_reviews.title: Quality at affordable prices
customer_reviews.text: Awesome watch. Nice face/numbers and the blue background. As usual, Michael Kors products are reasonably priced and quality product line.

customer_reviews.title: Great man’s watch!!!
customer_reviews.text: Just what I wanted and what I expected. Quality is outstanding on this chronograph. Keeps extremely accurate time. Looks great with a high quality leather band and has a large face for easy viewing.

customer_reviews.title: Great watch!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my boyfriend's birthday. The box it came in was very durable and hefty. The watch was in perfect condition and he loved it!

customer_reviews.title: Love it

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful watch

customer_reviews.title: she uses the same Amazon as me) and I love it. Looks really sharp and has two leather ...

product_meta.title: Michael Kors Men's Watch
product_meta.description:
PRODUCT DETAILS
 * Is Discontinued By Manufacturer :No
 * Item model number :MK8618
 * Department :Mens
 * Batteries :1 LR44 batteries required. (included)
 * Date First Available :May 18, 2018
 * Manufacturer :Michael Kors Watches
 * ASIN :B079G5Q2X9

 * 

 * Customer Reviews:4.7 out of 5 stars345 ratings
feature_bullets: Case Size: 45 mm x 52 mm; Band Width: 22 mm; Case Thickness: 13 mm
Band Material: Leather; Movement: Quartz; Water Resistance: 10 ATM
Water resistant to 100m (330ft): in general, suitable for swimming and snorkeling, but not diving
